notes_coach: Preseason kickoff; spacing + no-middle foundation; keep reps crisp and instructional.

drills.setup: Each player with 2 balls on baseline.
drills.execution: 20 s each: low, high, cross, between, behind.
drills.coaching_points: Stay low; eyes up; fingertips, not palms.

drills.execution: Jog, high-knees, butt-kicks, slides, backpedal to half ×2.
drills.coaching_points: Quality movement; posture; athletic arms.

items.cues_headline: Off-foot plant, eyes on square, soft touch.

drills.setup: One player under rim with ball.
drills.execution: Alternate R/L off glass without dribble.
drills.coaching_points: Eyes on square; inside foot; soft touch.

drills.execution: Continuous reverse layups alternating sides.
drills.coaching_points: Use board; protect ball; balanced steps.

items.objective: Build shot mechanics and crisp passes.

drills.execution: High reps focusing on B-E-E-F.
drills.coaching_points: Hold follow-through; arc; soft wrist snap.

drills.execution: 10 chest, 10 bounce, 10 overhead; quick-release set.
drills.coaching_points: Snap wrists; thumbs down; step to target; talk.

items.cues_headline: Cut hard to rim; fill immediately.

drills.execution: Pass → basket cut → fill; continuous.
drills.coaching_points: Cut hard; fill immediately; keep 15–18 ft.

drills.execution: Pass, replace open spot, keep ball hot.
drills.coaching_points: Replace on time; talk through rotations.
drills.variations: Add light defender to cue timing.

items.objective: Teach stance angle and force sideline.
items.cues_headline: Top foot to sideline; no middle!

drills.execution: Defender forces sideline; chest square; contain.
drills.coaching_points: Inside foot up; no reach; active hands.
drills.variations: Weak-hand drives; add cones for help spots.

drills.execution: Sprint → choppy steps → high hands; contest without flying by.
drills.coaching_points: High hands; controlled stop; call 'Ball!'.

drills.execution: Coach shoots; D box out, pursue, two-hand board, outlet.
drills.coaching_points: Call 'Shot!'; hit & get; chin and outlet.

items.objective: Apply spacing & cuts vs light D.

drills.execution: Run L1 cuts in live context; coach dead-balls to teach spacing.
drills.coaching_points: Talk; space 15–18 ft; eyes on cutter.
drills.variations: Require 3 passes before shot; 1 paint touch.

items.cues_headline: Effort is a habit; deposit daily.

items.script: When Giannis was a kid in Greece, he worked even when no one watched. Effort is a habit—every rep is a deposit you’ll withdraw on game day.
items.questions: What’s one habit you can own this week? When is effort hardest for you?

notes_coach: Emphasize sharing the ball, extra pass, and help-the-helper on D.

items.objective: Raise ball control and pace-change awareness.
items.cues_headline: Low stance; eyes up; change speeds.

drills.execution: Slow to half → burst to baseline; repeat with crossover.
drills.coaching_points: Sell slow; explode after plant; protect ball.
drills.variations: Add hesitation or inside-out at half.

drills.setup: Baseline start; two balls per player.
drills.execution: 10 ft segments: cross → between → behind to far end.
drills.coaching_points: Stay in stance; keep rhythm; spacing between balls.

items.objective: Add contact and balance at rim.

drills.setup: Lines on wings; coach with pad at rim.
drills.execution: 1-dribble → two-foot jump through pad → finish.
drills.coaching_points: Two-foot gather; chin ball; land balanced.
drills.variations: Finish off either foot; add weak-hand.

drills.setup: Coach with pad inside restricted area.
drills.execution: Attack from slot/wing; absorb bump; finish off two.
drills.coaching_points: Protect ball; finish through chest; eyes up.

drills.execution: Make 3 in a row before moving; reset on miss.
drills.coaching_points: Routine; rim focus; soft snap.

drills.execution: Shot fake → 1 hard dribble → pull-up; rebound own shot.
drills.coaching_points: Hard first dribble; stop on two; vertical rise.

drills.execution: Top to wing pass → front cut; next rep back cut vs denial.
drills.coaching_points: Read defender; cut decisively; seal if needed.

drills.execution: Teammate back-cuts; next player fills; continuous.
drills.coaching_points: Recognize dribble-at cue; sharp back-cut.

items.cues_headline: Top foot to sideline; loud talk.

drills.execution: Jump to ball; deny middle; help early; rebound.
drills.coaching_points: Force sideline; loud talk; stance.

drills.setup: Offense passes perimeter; D in denial.
drills.execution: Every pass → jump to ball line → recover.
drills.coaching_points: Quick jump as ball leaves hands; see ball & man.

items.objective: Teach Box series timing; safe inbound.

drills.execution: Inbound → wing/middle → reverse → advance.
drills.coaching_points: Stay wide; meet passes; middle early; reverse.

drills.execution: Defense earns 5 stops in a row; reset on score.
drills.coaching_points: Communicate; box out; finish plays.

items.script: The Warriors built a dynasty sharing the ball. Assists create trust. Our points belong to all five.
items.questions: How do you celebrate a teammate’s make? What’s a great ‘one more’ pass?

notes_coach: Layer 2 timing reads; controlled closeouts and rotations.

items.objective: Build rhythm and reaction with partner.

drills.setup: Each player with 2 balls on baseline.
drills.execution: 20s each pattern (low/high/cross/between/behind).
drills.coaching_points: Low stance; eyes up; fingertips.

drills.execution: Change-of-direction at each cone full-court.
drills.coaching_points: Push outside body; explode after change.

items.cues_headline: Hard dribble; stop on two; rise vertical.

drills.execution: Continuous reverse layups alternating sides.
drills.coaching_points: Use glass; protect ball; balanced steps.

drills.execution: 1-dribble to two-foot jump through pad; finish.
drills.coaching_points: Two-foot gather; chin ball; eyes up.

items.cues_headline: Drive to score; pass on time.

drills.execution: Top drives → kick wing → one-more to corner → shot.
drills.coaching_points: Paint touch; pass on time; ready feet.

drills.execution: 1-and-1: make +1 → next shooter; miss = team slide.
drills.coaching_points: Same routine; breathe; aim spot.
drills.variations: Set team goal to clear drill.

items.cues_headline: Read defender’s head; move with ball.

drills.execution: Drive middle → kick wing → wing penetrates opposite gap; top replaces.
drills.coaching_points: Drive to score; replace immediately.
drills.variations: Add extra pass or closeout D.

drills.execution: Drive → perimeter circle move same direction.
drills.coaching_points: Move as ball moves; arc spacing.

items.objective: Stunt, help, rotate, close under control.

drills.execution: Top drives → help from wing → recover on kick.
drills.coaching_points: Early help; short closeout; balance.

drills.setup: Two lines baseline; coach on wing.
drills.execution: Closeout → coach shoots → box out live for board.
drills.coaching_points: Connect closeout to rebound; two-hand board.

items.objective: Box concepts from sideline under count.

drills.execution: Screen-the-screener; first cutter rim; second corner; read.
drills.coaching_points: Solid screens; timing; inbound poise.

drills.execution: Top screen for cutter; weak-side long option; read help.
drills.coaching_points: Spacing; seal; strong inbound pass.

drills.execution: Ball moves → gap help early; talk.
drills.coaching_points: See ball & man; early gap; constant talk.

items.script: Discipline beats motivation: Kobe trained before sunrise so the work was already won by 9 a.m.
items.questions: What’s your ‘4 a.m.’—a task you’ll do daily without being asked?

notes_coach: Loud/early talk; no-middle integrity; R&R circle movement.

drills.execution: Jog, high-knees, butt-kicks, slides, backpedal to half ×2.
drills.coaching_points: Quality movement; posture.

drills.execution: Slow to half then burst; repeat patterns.
drills.coaching_points: Sell slow; explode; protect ball.

drills.execution: Absorb contact; finish off two.
drills.coaching_points: Protect ball; eyes up; through chest.

drills.execution: 1-and-1 ladder; track team total.
drills.coaching_points: Routine; breath; aim point.

drills.execution: 30–45s to make as many; track PBs.
drills.coaching_points: Quick set feet; catch-ready hands.

drills.execution: Shot fake → 1 dribble → pull-up.
drills.coaching_points: Hard first dribble; stop on two.

drills.execution: Skip → attack closeout → circle move.
drills.coaching_points: Attack closeout; next fills; drive to score.

drills.execution: Top drives → wing → one-more to corner → shot.
drills.coaching_points: Paint touch; extra pass; ready feet.

items.cues_headline: Stay wide; meet passes; middle flash.

drills.execution: Coach drives; help slides; rotate & recover.
drills.coaching_points: Early help; hands high; under control.

drills.execution: Help tags cutter → recovers to man.
drills.coaching_points: Low stance; active hands; call 'tag'.
drills.variations: Add live drive and post feed.

items.cues_headline: Loud early talk wins close games.

drills.execution: Inbound → reverse through trail → sideline or middle cutter.
drills.coaching_points: Reverse > dribble; spacing 15 ft; talk outlets.

items.script: Defense works when we talk early and loud. Communication connects five players into one.
items.questions: What words should we call on D? Who can be today’s Talk Captain?

notes_coach: Situational reps; press-breaker decisions; controlled tempo.

items.objective: Get loose; rhythm with two balls.

drills.execution: Leader performs moves; follower mirrors; switch :30.
drills.coaching_points: Eye contact; quick reaction; mirror feet.

drills.execution: Cross → between → behind every 10 ft down/back.
drills.coaching_points: Stay in stance; rhythm; spacing.

drills.execution: Alternate right/left off glass; no dribble.
drills.coaching_points: Eyes on square; inside foot; soft touch.

drills.execution: Dribble full-court; finish; next rebounds and goes.
drills.coaching_points: Correct hand/foot; eyes on square; strong finish.

drills.execution: High reps focusing B-E-E-F.
drills.coaching_points: Hold finish; arc; soft snap.

drills.execution: Drive → kick → one-more → shot; rotate.
drills.coaching_points: Paint touch; on-time/on-target.

items.objective: Trap, rotate, recover; stop ball first.

drills.execution: Entry to post → passer cuts/relocates; post kick-out read.
drills.coaching_points: Relocate after feed; keep spacing wide.

drills.execution: All layers live; dead-balls to teach spacing.
drills.coaching_points: Play with spacing; keep dribble alive.

drills.setup: 5 lines baseline; coach toss to O.
drills.execution: Sprint to paint; stop ball; match; talk.
drills.coaching_points: Sprint; point & talk; locate.

drills.execution: Coach shoots; D box out; board; outlet.
drills.coaching_points: Hit & get; two-hand board; call 'Shot!'.

items.cues_headline: Calm is a habit under pressure.

drills.execution: Top screen to ball; weak-side long option.
drills.coaching_points: Spacing; seal; inbound strength.

items.script: When chaos hits, our habits keep us calm. Breathe, pivot, find the pass.
items.questions: How do you calm yourself in a tough moment?

drills.execution: Change-of-direction at each cone full-court.
drills.coaching_points: Low stance; push outside body; explode.

drills.execution: Slow to half → burst to baseline; repeat.
drills.coaching_points: Sell slow; explode; protect ball.

items.cues_headline: Through chest; chin ball; land strong.

drills.execution: Make 3-in-row to move; reset on miss.
drills.coaching_points: Routine; rim focus; soft snap.

drills.execution: 1-and-1 ladder; team goal.
drills.coaching_points: Same routine; breath; aim.

items.objective: Blend L1–L3 in controlled live play.

drills.execution: Drive → circle move in ball direction.
drills.coaching_points: Move as ball moves; arc spacing.

drills.execution: Entry to post → relocate/cut → kick-out reads.
drills.coaching_points: Relocate after feed; spacing.

drills.setup: Pairs at top; O gets 3 dribbles.
drills.execution: Force sideline; chest square; contain.
drills.coaching_points: Inside foot up; active hands.

drills.execution: Ball moves → gap help early; talk.
drills.coaching_points: See ball & man; early gap; talk.

drills.execution: Inbound → reverse early → middle flash.
drills.coaching_points: Stay wide; meet passes; reverse.

drills.execution: Coach shoots; D box out; board; outlet.
drills.coaching_points: Hit & get; two-hand board; chin.

items.script: Duncan’s greatness was quiet—screens, extra passes, help rotations. Be like Tim.
items.questions: What’s a hidden play we can praise today?

notes_coach: End-of-preseason polish; special situations and crunch-time habits.

items.cues_headline: Quiet feet; correct steps to finish.

drills.execution: 20s each: low/high/cross/between/behind.
drills.coaching_points: Low stance; eyes up; fingertips.

drills.execution: Jog, high-knees, butt-kicks, slides, backpedal x2.
drills.coaching_points: Posture; quality; control.

items.cues_headline: Stop on two; vertical rise; balance.

drills.execution: 30–45s to make as many; track PBs.
drills.coaching_points: Quick set feet; ready hands.

drills.execution: Shot fake → 1 dribble → pull-up; rebound own shot.
drills.coaching_points: Hard first dribble; stop on two; rise vertical.

drills.execution: Back-cut on approach; next fills; repeat.
drills.coaching_points: Read cue; decisive cut; strong finish.

drills.execution: Drive → wing → one-more to corner → shot.
drills.coaching_points: Paint touch; extra pass; ready feet.

drills.execution: Trap first pass → rotate to open → recover.
drills.coaching_points: Controlled trap; sprint rotation chain.
drills.variations: Add shot to finish with rebound.

drills.execution: Closeout → shot → box out live.
drills.coaching_points: Connect closeout to rebound; two-hand board.

drills.execution: Down 2 (:10), up 1 (:20), ATOs, foul/defend.
drills.coaching_points: Know time/score; huddles; execute calmly.

drills.execution: Coach shoots; D box; board; outlet.
drills.coaching_points: Hit & get; two-hand board; chin & outlet.

drills.execution: Defense must earn 5 stops in a row.
drills.coaching_points: Talk; rebound; finish the play.

items.objective: Finish Strong: effort to the horn.
items.cues_headline: Who are we when the clock runs out?

items.story_title: Who Are You When the Clock Runs Out?
items.script: It’s not the score; it’s your effort, respect, and gratitude. Finish every rep strong.
items.questions: How can we finish quarters better?

items.script: Mistakes happen. Winners respond with the next right action.
items.questions: Share a moment you bounced back fast.

items.script: Pressure is organized teamwork, not gambling. Trust rotations.
items.questions: When should we trap and when contain?

items.script: The extra pass and sharp cuts add up. Details decide outcomes.
items.questions: What tiny detail made a big play this week?

items.script: Energy is a choice. Toughness is doing your job, even when you’re tired.
items.questions: How do you create energy for your team?

items.script: Lincoln said: give me 6 hours to chop a tree and I’ll spend 4 sharpening the axe. Practice is sharpening.
items.questions: What skill will you sharpen this week?

items.script: Pivot, pass fake, middle flash—calm feet, calm eyes.
items.questions: What’s your first look vs a trap?

items.script: Turn down an okay shot for a great one. That’s team maturity.
items.questions: What makes a shot ‘great’ for you?

items.script: Rebounds are effort stats. One board can win a game.
items.questions: What’s ‘hit and get’ mean to you?

items.script: Time, score, fouls, possession arrow—be the smartest team on the floor.
items.questions: Name one late-game decision you’d make.

items.script: Gratitude fuels joy; joyful teams practice harder and play freer.
items.questions: Who do you thank this week and why?

items.script: We win the right way—respect opponents, officials, and the game.
items.questions: What’s classy competition look like?

items.script: Basketball is problem-solving at speed. Adjust faster than they do.
items.questions: What’s one in-game adjustment you made recently?

items.script: Big moments mean we earned the stage. Breathe and execute.
items.questions: How do you re-center yourself under pressure?

items.script: We’re grateful for growth, win or lose. Humility keeps us hungry.
items.questions: What’s one lesson you’ll carry beyond basketball?
